## Public Member Functions

### applyFixup() {#a29e40738fcf4d771be936969f54b2d1a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RISCVAsmBackend::applyFixup (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &amp; Fixup, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> &amp; Target, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef</a>&lt; char &gt; Data, uint64&#95;t Value, bool IsResolved, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Apply the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a></code> for given <code>Fixup</code> into the provided data fragment, at the offset specified by the fixup and following the fixup kind as appropriate.

Errors (such as an out of range fixup value) should be reported via <code>Ctx</code>. The <code>STI</code> is present only for fragments of type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcrelaxablefragment">MCRelaxableFragment</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcdatafragment">MCDataFragment</a> with hasInstructions() == true.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvasmbackend-h/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvasmbackend-h">RISCVAsmBackend.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvasmbackend-cpp/#l00628">628</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/lib/target/riscv/mctargetdesc/riscvasmbackend-cpp">RISCVAsmBackend.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getNumFixupKinds() {#adb6ee79095712ce921a73cdb0fccf79d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::RISCVAsmBackend::getNumFixupKinds () const"
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Get the number of target specific fixup kinds.
